Khris Griffis, Ph.D.

Driven, multifaceted, and collaborative scientific adventurer with more than 10 years of academic research experience. Experienced neuroscientist with a strong understanding in multiple physical and theoretical disciplines, offering extensive background incorporating statistical, mathematical and computational methodology into biological research. Strong communicator with the ability to lead scientific discussions, and communicate results to scientific and non-scientific audiences.
